innovative_telegram_bot: With Royal Apart, you can easily find your perfect apartment using our innovative Telegram bot, which provides fast rental right at your fingertips.
apartment_description: Each apartment features custom design, emphasizing comfort and relaxation.
best_apartments: We offer the best apartments at affordable prices. Guaranteed perfect cleanliness in every apartment.
royal_care: Royal Apart will comprehensively ensure your comfortable stay.
hero_feature_2: Apartments in the heart of Lviv
exceptional_service_text: Each of our guests is unique, so we have created a selection of individual services and experiences to make your stay truly unforgettable. Our team, formed of experts in luxury hospitality, provides impeccable service. We carefully and delicately anticipate the wishes of each guest, taking care of the smallest details.
review_1_text: "Our stay in the Lviv apartments was simply wonderful! Very cozy, clean and stylish ‚Äî everything thought out to the smallest detail. The location is perfect: quiet, but just a few minutes to the center. The hosts are incredibly friendly and always in touch."
review_2_text: "Everything was great: apartments match the photos, pleasant service and very convenient check-in. Location is top, and inside ‚Äî clean and comfortable. We will definitely come back."
review_3_text: "Incredibly stylish interior, peaceful atmosphere and perfect cleanliness. It felt like we were at home. Thank you for the care and quick responses."
fancy_design_text: Every space is carefully thought out to reflect the undeniable elegance of Lviv
fancy_location_title: PRESTIGIOUS LOCATIONS IN THE HEART OF LVIV
fancy_location_text: Our apartments are located in the most exclusive and sought-after areas of the city
fancy_service_text: Private service and personalization of every moment of your stay
telegram_promo: With our Telegram bot you can easily find your dream accommodation!
service_cozyness_intro: Royal Apart is more than just apartments. It is your personal space in the heart of Lviv, where the comfort of a home-like stay harmoniously combines with the personalized service of a luxury hotel. We have created the perfect place for you to enjoy the unique atmosphere of the old city without giving up maximum comfort and care.
service_cozyness_card1_desc: A discreet and thorough cleaning service that ensures your apartments are always impeccably clean and ready to welcome you.
service_cozyness_card2_desc: Aristo is a restaurant of European cuisine where taste, music, and emotions create a special atmosphere. We offer you a 15% discount on delivery with the promo code ARISTOSITE.
service_cozyness_card3_desc: Our manager is always in touch to help you with any questions or needs, ensuring seamless and comfortable rest.
service_additional_intro: Since every stay should meet your expectations, our additional service is here to bring your wishes to life ‚Äì from the simplest requests to the most exclusive experiences. Whether it is booking a table at the most popular restaurants, organizing private tours to iconic places, providing a personal driver, or curating a truly individual experience, we take care of every detail with discretion and excellence.
service_additional_item1_desc: Enjoy premium comfort, soft bedding, and a completely relaxing atmosphere, without any rush at all.
service_additional_item2_desc: Treat yourself to well-deserved rest. A hot bath with aromatic foam, a glass of your favorite drink, and silence ‚Äî perfect for rebooting.
service_additional_item3_desc: A convenient vanity table, perfect lighting, and a stylish mirror are created for your evening beauty ritual and getting ready to go out.
service_additional_item4_desc: Breakfast with an inspiring view. Order breakfast from the Aristo restaurant with a 15% discount and start your day with pure pleasure! Promo code ‚Äì ARISTOSITE.
service_additional_item5_desc: Our apartments are the perfect place to celebrate special occasions. Gather your closest people at a beautifully set table and create unforgettable memories!
rules_q1_title: What are check-in and check-out times?
rules_q1_a3: ‚Ä¢ One day before your arrival, our administrator will contact you to arrange check-in.
rules_q2_title: How do I receive the keys?
rules_q2_a1: ‚Ä¢ The administrator will send you self check-in instructions.
rules_q3_a1: ‚Ä¢ The guest bears full financial responsibility for any damaged property.
rules_q3_a2: ‚Ä¢ It is forbidden to disturb the peace after 22:00 ‚Äì penalty 2500 UAH or immediate eviction.
rules_q3_a4: ‚Ä¢ An additional fee for staying with a pet is negotiated and paid separately (700 UAH for the entire stay); in case of unauthorized stay with a pet, a 2500 UAH penalty applies.
rules_q4_title: How do I receive booking confirmation?
rules_q4_a1: ‚Ä¢ Our managers will contact you as soon as they receive your booking request, or you can contact us yourself. If you do not guarantee your reservation with a credit card, we will contact you to clarify the prepayment method.
rules_q5_a1: ‚Ä¢ Yes, you need to make a prepayment for the first night. You can pay by providing a credit card in the booking, transferring funds to the company‚Äôs corporate card, or paying in cash at our office at 5 Vesela St., Lviv (see Google Maps).
rules_q6_a1: ‚Ä¢ The guest can cancel free of charge up to 30 days before arrival. After the free cancellation period ends, the prepayment is non-refundable.
rules_q7_title: What is included in the accommodation price?
rules_q7_a12: ‚Äì 24/7 technical support and all taxes and fees included.
rules_q8_title: What additional services can I receive for an extra fee (by prior agreement)?
hero_subtitle: GET IN TOUCH WITH US ANYTIME
section_text: Message us or call ‚Äî we will help with booking, check-in, additional services, and any questions during your stay.
extra_services: We can also assist with transfers, breakfasts, cleaning, and additional services during your stay.
quick_contact_text: Choose the most convenient way ‚Äî we respond quickly.

experience.p1: Royal Apart offers cozy, high-quality apartments in some of Lviv‚Äôs best buildings. This is your private, peaceful corner in the heart of the historic city.
experience.p2: Each apartment is fully equipped and has its own character. We make sure the design is not only modern, but also respects Lviv‚Äôs architecture and matches the spirit of our city.
experience.p3: We renovate our apartments ourselves, working with local craftsmen and designers. We think through every detail so your stay is –º–∞–∫—Å–∏–º–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ comfortable, cozy, and truly authentic.
experience.s1: Royal Apart is quality proven over the years and always great locations! Our apartments are in convenient places‚Äîclose to the center, yet quiet enough to relax.
experience.s2: These are comfortable temporary homes where you can unwind after exploring the city. They are reliable, safe, and ideal for rest. We value your time, so we provide simple service and support. Our team is always available and ready to help with any question or advice.
experience.s3: We combine modern convenience (easy booking, fast check-in) with a human approach and genuine care for every guest.

second_part.p1: We truly love Lviv ‚Äî its history and its incredible architecture!
second_part.p2: The Royal Apart team created these apartments for travelers who value luxury and privacy, to experience the city in a new way. We offer stylish, thoughtfully designed apartments and assign you a personal manager who will help with everything you need.
second_part.p3: Royal Apart is more than just apartments. It‚Äôs your private space in the heart of Lviv, where the cozy feeling of home blends with the personalized service of an upscale hotel. We created the perfect place for you to enjoy the unique atmosphere of the old city without giving up maximum comfort and attention to detail.
